languages.text: "Речь плебса пестрит красками, за которыми скрываются его истинные темные оттенки. Старик множество раз лгал в прошлом, хитрит и сейчас, но... в его словах я не вижу скверны и злого умысла".

"The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no foul corruption or ill intent in his words."
languages.original_text: "Речь плебса пестрит красками, за которыми скрываются его истинные темные оттенки. Старик множество раз лгал в прошлом, хитрит и сейчас, но... в его словах я не вижу скверны и злого умысла".

traits.locale_text: "The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no corruption or ill intent in his words."

"The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no corruption or ill intent in his words."

"The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no foul corruption or ill intent in his words."

languages.text: "Diese Worte sind von Farben durchzogen, die wahre, dunklere Töne verbergen. Dieser alte Mann hat in seinem Leben viel gelogen, und auch jetzt setzt er seine Schliche bei uns ein, aber .. Ich sehe keine Verderbnis oder böse Absicht in dem, was er sagt."
languages.original_text: "The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no foul corruption or ill intent in his words."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Worte sind von Farben durchzogen, die wahre, dunklere Töne verbergen. Dieser alte Mann hat in seinem Leben viel gelogen, und auch jetzt setzt er seine Schliche bei uns ein, aber .. ich sehe keine Verderbnis oder böse Absicht in dem, was er sagt."

languages.text: « Les mots de ce vieillard sont marbrés de couleurs dissimulant ses véritables teintes, plus sombres. Il a passé toute sa vie à mentir et il emploie les mêmes artifices avec nous, mais... je ne vois aucune corruption ou mauvaise intention dans ses paroles. »
languages.original_text: "The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no foul corruption or ill intent in his words."

traits.locale_text: « Les mots de ce vieillard sont marbrés de couleurs dissimulant ses véritables teintes, plus sombres. Il a passé toute sa vie à mentir et il emploie les mêmes artifices avec nous, mais... je ne vois aucune corruption ou mauvaise intention dans ses paroles. »

languages.text: “这个下等人的言语中充满了杂乱的色彩，掩盖了他真实的阴影。这个老人已经说惯了谎言，此刻也打算哄骗我们。不过……从他的话语中，我看不到任何腐化或恶意的踪迹。”
languages.original_text: "The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no foul corruption or ill intent in his words."

traits.locale_text: “这个下等人的言语中充满了杂乱的色彩，掩盖了他真实的阴影。这个老人已经说惯了谎言，此刻也打哄骗我们。不过……从他的话语中，我看不到任何腐化或恶意的踪迹。”

languages.text: 「その下賤の者の話は、彼の本当の暗い色を隠す色彩に彩られています。この老人は長年にわたり嘘をつき続け、あたくしたちをも騙そうとしていますが…その言葉に腐敗や悪意は感じられません」
languages.original_text: "The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no foul corruption or ill intent in his words."

traits.locale_text: 「そのロウボーンの話は、真実の、暗い色を隠すための色でまだらに覆われています。この老人は長年にわたり嘘をつき続け、私たちをもだまそうとしている。でも…彼の言葉には腐敗や悪意は見えません」
「その下賤の者の話は、彼の本当の暗い色を隠す色彩に彩られています。この老人は長年にわたり嘘をつき続け、あたくしたちをも騙そうとしていますが…その言葉に腐敗や悪意は感じられません」

languages.text: «El discurso de este ser de baja cuna está adornado con colores que esconden su verdadero y más oscuro tono. Este anciano acostumbra a mentir y está usando sus artimañas contra nosotros, pero... no detecto vil corrupción ni malas intenciones en sus palabras».
languages.original_text: "The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no foul corruption or ill intent in his words."

traits.locale_text: «El discurso de este ser de baja cuna está adornado con colores que esconden su verdadero y más oscuro tono. Este anciano acostumbra a mentir y está usando sus artimañas contra nosotros, pero... no detecto corrupción ni malas intenciones en sus palabras».

languages.text: "Alt tabakalının konuşması, daha koyu olan asıl tonlarını gizleyen renklerle bezeli. Bu adamın yaşı kadar yalan geçmişi var ve desiselerini bizim üstümüzde de kullanıyor ama... Sözlerinde kötü niyet ya da yozluk görmüyorum."
languages.original_text: "The lowborn's speech is mottled with colours that conceal his true, darker hues. This old man has a long history of lies, and he is using his wiles on us as well, but... I see no foul corruption or ill intent in his words."

traits.locale_text: "Alt tabakalının konuşması, daha koyu olan asıl tonlarını gizleyen renklerle bezeli. Bu adamın yaşı kadar yalan geçmişi var ve desiselerini bizim üstümüzde de kullanıyor ama... Sözlerinde kötü niyet ya da yozluk görmüyorum."
